theme.description:
Theme, the CSS style sheet.
You may also use `themeCSS` to override this value.

meta:enum.null: Can be set to disable any pre-defined mermaid theme

look.description: Defines which main look to use for the diagram.

handDrawnSeed.description: Defines the seed to be used when using handDrawn look. This is important for the automated tests as they will always find differences without the seed. The default value is 0 which gives a random seed.

layout.description: Defines which layout algorithm to use for rendering the diagram.

maxTextSize.description: The maximum allowed size of the users text diagram

maxEdges.description: Defines the maximum number of edges that can be drawn in a graph.

mergeEdges.description: Elk specific option that allows edges to share path where it convenient. It can make for pretty diagrams but can also make it harder to read the diagram.

nodePlacementStrategy.description: Elk specific option affecting how nodes are placed.

cycleBreakingStrategy.description: This strategy decides how to find cycles in the graph and deciding which edges need adjustment to break loops.

fontFamily.description:
Specifies the font to be used in the rendered diagrams.
Can be any possible CSS `font-family`.
See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/font-family

logLevel.description: This option decides the amount of logging to be used by mermaid.

securityLevel.description: Level of trust for parsed diagram

meta:enum.strict: (**default**) HTML tags in the text are encoded and click functionality is disabled.
meta:enum.antiscript: HTML tags in text are allowed (only script elements are removed), and click functionality is enabled.
meta:enum.loose: HTML tags in text are allowed and click functionality is enabled.
meta:enum.sandbox:
With this security level, all rendering takes place in a sandboxed iframe.
This prevent any JavaScript from running in the context.
This may hinder interactive functionality of the diagram, like scripts, popups in the sequence diagram, or links to other tabs or targets, etc.

startOnLoad.description: Dictates whether mermaid starts on Page load

arrowMarkerAbsolute.description:
Controls whether or arrow markers in html code are absolute paths or anchors.
This matters if you are using base tag settings.

secure.description:
This option controls which `currentConfig` keys are considered secure and
can only be changed via call to `mermaid.initialize`.
This prevents malicious graph directives from overriding a site's default security.

legacyMathML.description:
This option specifies if Mermaid can expect the dependent to include KaTeX stylesheets for browsers
without their own MathML implementation. If this option is disabled and MathML is not supported, the math
equations are replaced with a warning. If this option is enabled and MathML is not supported, Mermaid will
fall back to legacy rendering for KaTeX.

forceLegacyMathML.description:
This option forces Mermaid to rely on KaTeX's own stylesheet for rendering MathML. Due to differences between OS
fonts and browser's MathML implementation, this option is recommended if consistent rendering is important.
If set to true, ignores legacyMathML.

deterministicIds.description:
This option controls if the generated ids of nodes in the SVG are
generated randomly or based on a seed.
If set to `false`, the IDs are generated based on the current date and
thus are not deterministic. This is the default behavior.

This matters if your files are checked into source control e.g. git and
should not change unless content is changed.

deterministicIDSeed.description:
This option is the optional seed for deterministic ids.
If set to `undefined` but deterministicIds is `true`, a simple number iterator is used.
You can set this attribute to base the seed on a static string.

dompurifyConfig.title: DOM Purify Configuration
dompurifyConfig.description: Configuration options to pass to the `dompurify` library.

suppressErrorRendering.description:
Suppresses inserting 'Syntax error' diagram in the DOM.
This is useful when you want to control how to handle syntax errors in your application.

useMaxWidth.description:
When this flag is set to `true`, the height and width is set to 100%
and is then scaled with the available space.
If set to `false`, the absolute space required is used.

C4DiagramConfig.title: C4 Diagram Config
C4DiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for c4 diagrams

diagramMarginX.description: Margin to the right and left of the c4 diagram, must be a positive value.

diagramMarginY.description: Margin to the over and under the c4 diagram, must be a positive value.

c4ShapeInRow.description: How many shapes to place in each row.

c4BoundaryInRow.description: How many boundaries to place in each row.

personFontSize.description: This sets the font size of Person shape for the diagram

personFontFamily.description: This sets the font weight of Person shape for the diagram

personFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of Person shape for the diagram

external_personFontSize.description: This sets the font size of External Person shape for the diagram

external_personFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of External Person shape for the diagram

external_personFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of External Person shape for the diagram

systemFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of System shape for the diagram

systemFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of System shape for the diagram

system_dbFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of System DB shape for the diagram

external_system_dbFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of External System DB shape for the diagram

external_system_dbFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of External System DB shape for the diagram

system_queueFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of System Queue shape for the diagram

system_queueFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of System Queue shape for the diagram

external_system_queueFontSize.description: This sets the font size of External System Queue shape for the diagram

external_system_queueFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of External System Queue shape for the diagram

external_system_queueFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of External System Queue shape for the diagram

boundaryFontSize.description: This sets the font size of Boundary shape for the diagram

boundaryFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of Boundary shape for the diagram

boundaryFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of Boundary shape for the diagram

messageFontSize.description: This sets the font size of Message shape for the diagram

messageFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of Message shape for the diagram

messageFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of Message shape for the diagram

containerFontSize.description: This sets the font size of Container shape for the diagram

containerFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of Container shape for the diagram

containerFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of Container shape for the diagram

external_containerFontSize.description: This sets the font size of External Container shape for the diagram

external_containerFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of External Container shape for the diagram

external_containerFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of External Container shape for the diagram

container_dbFontSize.description: This sets the font size of Container DB shape for the diagram

container_dbFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of Container DB shape for the diagram

container_dbFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of Container DB shape for the diagram

external_container_dbFontSize.description: This sets the font size of External Container DB shape for the diagram

external_container_dbFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of External Container DB shape for the diagram

external_container_dbFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of External Container DB shape for the diagram

container_queueFontSize.description: This sets the font size of Container Queue shape for the diagram

container_queueFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of Container Queue shape for the diagram

container_queueFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of Container Queue shape for the diagram

external_container_queueFontSize.description: This sets the font size of External Container Queue shape for the diagram

external_container_queueFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of External Container Queue shape for the diagram

external_container_queueFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of External Container Queue shape for the diagram

componentFontSize.description: This sets the font size of Component shape for the diagram

componentFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of Component shape for the diagram

componentFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of Component shape for the diagram

external_componentFontSize.description: This sets the font size of External Component shape for the diagram

external_componentFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of External Component shape for the diagram

external_componentFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of External Component shape for the diagram

component_dbFontSize.description: This sets the font size of Component DB shape for the diagram

component_dbFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of Component DB shape for the diagram

component_dbFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of Component DB shape for the diagram

external_component_dbFontSize.description: This sets the font size of External Component DB shape for the diagram

external_component_dbFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of External Component DB shape for the diagram

external_component_dbFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of External Component DB shape for the diagram

component_queueFontSize.description: This sets the font size of Component Queue shape for the diagram

component_queueFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of Component Queue shape for the diagram

component_queueFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of Component Queue shape for the diagram

external_component_queueFontSize.description: This sets the font size of External Component Queue shape for the diagram

external_component_queueFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of External Component Queue shape for the diagram

external_component_queueFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of External Component Queue shape for the diagram

wrap.description: This sets the auto-wrap state for the diagram

wrapPadding.description: This sets the auto-wrap padding for the diagram (sides only)

titleTopMargin.description: Margin top for the text over the diagram

arrowMarkerAbsolute.description:
Controls whether or arrow markers in html code are absolute paths or anchors.
This matters if you are using base tag settings.

RequirementDiagramConfig.title: Requirement Diagram Config
RequirementDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for req diagrams

ArchitectureDiagramConfig.title: Architecture Diagram Config
ArchitectureDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for architecture diagrams

MindmapDiagramConfig.title: Mindmap Diagram Config
MindmapDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for mindmap diagrams

KanbanDiagramConfig.title: Kanban Diagram Config
KanbanDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for kanban diagrams

textPosition.description: Axial position of slice's label from zero at the center to 1 at the outside edges.

titleFontSize.description: Chart title top and bottom padding

quadrantPadding.description: quadrant title padding from top if the quadrant is rendered on top

quadrantTextTopPadding.description: quadrant title padding from top if the quadrant is rendered on top

pointTextPadding.description: padding between point and point label

pointRadius.description: radius of the point to be drawn

quadrantInternalBorderStrokeWidth.description: stroke width of edges of the box that are inside the quadrant

quadrantExternalBorderStrokeWidth.description: stroke width of edges of the box that are outside the quadrant

XYChartAxisConfig.title: XYChart axis config
XYChartAxisConfig.description: This object contains configuration for XYChart axis config

showLabel.description: Should show the axis labels (tick text)

labelFontSize.description: font size of the axis labels (tick text)

labelPadding.description: top and bottom space from axis label (tick text)

titleFontSize.description: font size of the axis title

titlePadding.description: top and bottom space from axis title

showTick.description: Should show the axis tick lines

tickLength.description: length of the axis tick lines

tickWidth.description: width of the axis tick lines

XYChartConfig.title: XYChart Config
XYChartConfig.description: This object contains configuration specific to XYCharts

titleFontSize.description: Font size of the chart title

titlePadding.description: Top and bottom space from the chart title

chartOrientation.description: How to plot will be drawn horizontal or vertical

plotReservedSpacePercent.description: Minimum percent of space plots of the chart will take

ErDiagramConfig.title: Er Diagram Config
ErDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for entity relationship diagrams

diagramPadding.description:
The amount of padding around the diagram as a whole so that embedded
diagrams have margins, expressed in pixels.

layoutDirection.description: Directional bias for layout of entities

minEntityWidth.description: The minimum width of an entity box. Expressed in pixels.

minEntityHeight.description: The minimum height of an entity box. Expressed in pixels.

entityPadding.description:
The minimum internal padding between text in an entity box and the enclosing box borders.
Expressed in pixels.

stroke.description: Stroke color of box edges and lines.

fontSize.description: Font size (expressed as an integer representing a number of pixels)

StateDiagramConfig.title: State Diagram Config
StateDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for entity relationship diagrams

fontSizeFactor.description:
Font size factor, this is used to guess the width of the edges labels
before rendering by dagre layout.
This might need updating if/when switching font

defaultRenderer.description: Decides which rendering engine that is to be used for the rendering.

meta:enum.dagre-wrapper: wrapper for dagre implemented in mermaid

arrowMarkerAbsolute.description:
Controls whether or arrow markers in html code are absolute paths or anchors.
This matters if you are using base tag settings.

JourneyDiagramConfig.title: Journey Diagram Config
JourneyDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for journey diagrams

boxTextMargin.description: Margin around the text in loop/alt/opt boxes

bottomMarginAdj.description:
Prolongs the edge of the diagram downwards.

Depending on css styling this might need adjustment.

rightAngles.description:
Curved Arrows become Right Angles

This will display arrows that start and begin at the same node as
right angles, rather than as curves.

textPlacement.description: text placement as: tspan | fo | old only text as before

boxTextMargin.description: Margin around the text in loop/alt/opt boxes

bottomMarginAdj.description:
Prolongs the edge of the diagram downwards.

Depending on css styling this might need adjustment.

rightAngles.description:
Curved Arrows become Right Angles

This will display arrows that start and begin at the same node as
right angles, rather than as curves.

textPlacement.description: text placement as: tspan | fo | old only text as before

GanttDiagramConfig.title: Gantt Diagram Config
GanttDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for gantt diagrams

barHeight.description: The height of the bars in the graph

barGap.description: The margin between the different activities in the gantt diagram

topPadding.description: Margin between title and gantt diagram and between axis and gantt diagram.

rightPadding.description: The space allocated for the section name to the right of the activities

leftPadding.description: The space allocated for the section name to the left of the activities

gridLineStartPadding.description: Vertical starting position of the grid lines

numberSectionStyles.description: The number of alternating section styles

axisFormat.description:
Date/time format of the axis

This might need adjustment to match your locale and preferences.

topAxis.description: When this flag is set, date labels will be added to the top of the chart

meta:enum.compact: Enables displaying multiple tasks on the same row.

weekday.description: On which day a week-based interval should start

SequenceDiagramConfig.title: Sequence Diagram Config
SequenceDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for sequence diagrams

diagramMarginX.description: Margin to the right and left of the sequence diagram

diagramMarginY.description: Margin to the over and under the sequence diagram

forceMenus.description: forces actor popup menus to always be visible (to support E2E testing).

showSequenceNumbers.description: This will show the node numbers

actorFontSize.description: This sets the font size of the actor's description

actorFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of the actor's description

actorFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of the actor's description

noteFontSize.description: This sets the font size of actor-attached notes

noteFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of actor-attached notes

noteFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of actor-attached notes

noteAlign.description: This sets the text alignment of actor-attached notes

messageFontSize.description: This sets the font size of actor messages

messageFontFamily.description: This sets the font family of actor messages

messageFontWeight.description: This sets the font weight of actor messages

wrap.description: This sets the auto-wrap state for the diagram

labelBoxWidth.description: This sets the width of the loop-box (loop, alt, opt, par)

labelBoxHeight.description: This sets the height of the loop-box (loop, alt, opt, par)

FlowchartDiagramConfig.title: Flowchart Diagram Config
FlowchartDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for flowcharts

subGraphTitleMargin.description: Defines a top/bottom margin for subgraph titles

htmlLabels.description: Flag for setting whether or not a html tag should be used for rendering labels on the edges.

nodeSpacing.description:
Defines the spacing between nodes on the same level

Pertains to horizontal spacing for TB (top to bottom) or BT (bottom to top) graphs,
and the vertical spacing for LR as well as RL graphs.

rankSpacing.description:
Defines the spacing between nodes on different levels

Pertains to horizontal spacing for TB (top to bottom) or BT (bottom to top) graphs,
and the vertical spacing for LR as well as RL graphs.

curve.description: Defines how mermaid renders curves for flowcharts.

padding.description:
Represents the padding between the labels and the shape

**Only used in new experimental rendering.**

wrappingWidth.description:
Width of nodes where text is wrapped.

When using markdown strings the text ius wrapped automatically, this
value sets the max width of a text before it continues on a new line.

SankeyLinkColor.description: Picks the color of the sankey diagram links, using the colors of the source and/or target of the links.

meta:enum.source: Use the source of sankey link for the color of the link.
meta:enum.target: Use the target of sankey link for the color of the link.
meta:enum.gradient: Use a gradient of the source and target for the color of the link.

SankeyNodeAlignment.description:
Controls the alignment of the Sankey diagrams.

See <https://github.com/d3/d3-sankey#alignments>.

meta:enum.left: Align all inputs to the left.
meta:enum.right: Align all outputs to the right.
meta:enum.center: Like `left`, except that nodes without any incoming links are moved as right as possible.
meta:enum.justify: Like `left`, except that nodes without any outgoing links are moved to the far right.

SankeyDiagramConfig.title: Sankey Diagram Config
SankeyDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for sankey diagrams.

linkColor.description: The color of the links in the sankey diagram.

showValues.description: Toggle to display or hide values along with title.

prefix.description: The prefix to use for values

suffix.description: The suffix to use for values

PacketDiagramConfig.title: Packet Diagram Config
PacketDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for packet diagrams.

rowHeight.description: The height of each row in the packet diagram.

bitWidth.description: The width of each bit in the packet diagram.

bitsPerRow.description: The number of bits to display per row.

showBits.description: Toggle to display or hide bit numbers.

paddingX.description: The horizontal padding between the blocks in a row.

paddingY.description: The vertical padding between the rows.

BlockDiagramConfig.title: Block Diagram Config
BlockDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for block diagrams.

RadarDiagramConfig.title: Radar Diagram Config
RadarDiagramConfig.description: The object containing configurations specific for radar diagrams.

width.description: The size of the radar diagram.

height.description: The size of the radar diagram.

marginTop.description: The margin from the top of the radar diagram.

marginRight.description: The margin from the right of the radar diagram.

marginBottom.description: The margin from the bottom of the radar diagram.

marginLeft.description: The margin from the left of the radar diagram.

axisScaleFactor.description: The scale factor of the axis.

axisLabelFactor.description: The scale factor of the axis label.

curveTension.description: The tension factor for the Catmull-Rom spline conversion to cubic Bzier curves.

FontCalculator.title: Font Calculator
